Multiclassing Guide for Baldur's Gate 3

Multiclassing in Baldur's Gate 3

Multiclassing is a feature that will be implemented upon the full release of Baldur's Gate 3. This is the ability to switch to another Class or Character and can be done in-game. In order to allow all your wildest dream class combinations, Larian removed Ability Score Prerequisites.
